name: Light and Shadow - Schatten über Empyria
name_original: Light and Shadow - Schatten über Empyria
description:
Overview

The full version of "Light and Shadows - Shadows over Empyria" is a role-playing game developed by RPGStudios, in which the player embarks on a completely new type of role-playing game. There is a maximum level of 999, you can either follow the story or work your way through the game*.

Meet new companions, regain your memory after a stranding, join a story guild, save the world from the shadow, or plunge it into ruin.

  • Banish evil from the world of Empyria - explore dungeons, join companions and experience an extraordinary adventure!
  • Become king of the monster arena: Your skills are tested in this place - get a new class (gladiator) and fight your way to the top with this class and then use this class in the free world to stand your ground against all evil.
  • Live your own dream with your own house and grow your own crops.
  • Uncover the secrets of the numerous dungeons.

Experience the World Of Light and Shadows!

If You Have Any Questions, Just Contact Us!
